dtliExcerpt: Amid all the celebrity hype on Broadway this season, Real Women Have Curves arrives with an outstanding cast of mostly unknowns, as incomparable as they are unlikely to star in a major Broadway musical. They are performing their hearts out in a production that is all heart. It is also funny, touching, tuneful and refreshingly original packed with a timely message. Put it all together and you have one spicy Mexican feast of a show – as savory as a hot tamale, smooth as flan and irresistibly tasty as a deep-fried churro.

keyPhrases.quote: outstanding cast of mostly unknowns, as incomparable as they are unlikely to star in a major Broadway musical
all heart. It is also funny, touching, tuneful and refreshingly original packed with a timely message
one spicy Mexican feast of a show – as savory as a hot tamale, smooth as flan and irresistibly tasty as a deep-fried churro

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Unqualified enthusiasm with superlatives throughout ('outstanding', 'incomparable', 'refreshingly original') and vivid positive metaphors comparing the show to delicious food, indicating strong recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm for the performances and overall production, indicating a strong recommendation.
